name: EURsmart
0:
”Alexa, turn on the kitchen.”
”Alexa, turn off the dinning room.”
”Alexa, dim living room.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can control your lighting, ceiling fan, socket(Plug), power board and products are related with Home appliance by Euralux Product including gateway through Alexa.
 
1. Firstly  you should download and install our App: Euralux Smart Home
2. Secondly you should get one device of Euralux gateway at least
 
Hereunder the procedure of operation :
 
1. Open Eurslux APP, register and Login Euralux Account.

2. While loading to main page, click the icon “ + “ on the right top and click “all devices” in the Manuel popped 


3. Add all your lighting, ceiling fans, plug, power board and other Euralux Products including the Euralux Gateway.
4.  When all devices finished to add .  Please click the new device of the Euralux Gateway and configure the WIFI information:  SSID and passwIword if you need to operate the other home appliance through the Euralux APP
 
You can start to try controlling all your devices through Euralux App after you finished to follow up the procedure as Euralux APP .  Expect the experience of the testing is Fun and perfect.
 
How to setup your Alexa with following Tips:
 
1. In your Alexa APP, click left top menue icon and select Skills and search “Ｅuralux Smart “
2. Euralux skill can guide you to the login page
3. Fill in your Euralux account and password then go to the next
4. Select the network and to be controlled by Alexa and click “ＤＯＷＮ”
5. You can start to control your devices with Alexa now.
